resources.string:
Quotes is a free Android application provided by me, Luca. Quotes does not collect any of your data and it never will. Every interaction with me is free to choose. I offer the possibility to send EMails to suggest features, give feedback and report bugs. As soon as the conversation between me and the user is ended, the feature is implemented (or not) or the bug has been fixed (or can't be fixed), I will delete the contact information (Email-Address) and the conversation for security and for privacy reasons.


I may change my Privacy Policy from time to time. Every change is effective immediately. An information to the change of this Privacy Policy will be added to the changelog.


Effective September 3, 2022

This app is using some permissions. This site will explain you, why my app needs specific permissions.

Read and write Storage:
The Quotes App needs to write and read storage to download the updates to your phone and to get the file out of the dir to install the update. No other data is written in you storage or read from your storage.

Full Internet access:
The Quotes App uses Internet (WiFi, mobile Data, other ways to connect to the internet) to parse the quotes (which are saved in the internet). No data will be collected by me with the interaction to the internet.

Install unknown packages:
This simply exists to download the update
This is what I was doing when it happened:\nThis is the bug:
Hello Luca, I wanted to tell you my opinion about this app:
Hello Luca,\nI thought about following feature:\nHave a great day :3
Go to "Permissions" and set "Files and Media" to allow.
Everything is working as planned. You can use the app without any troubles. If you still have troubles: Contact the developer
We currently have troubles reading parts of the file. That may affect the whole app. Contact the developer.

We are sorry but we can't reach the file.
That can have multiple triggers:
-The link is temporary not available. -The link is not up-to-date.
You have no internet connection.

If you are connected to the internet, contact the developer.
This App needs the permission to read and write in you internal storage to download and install the update. If you have doubts because of privacy, read "App permissions".
The quotes has been copied to your clipboard.
This device currently does not have internet access. You can\'t check whether a update is available or not

I want to say thank you especially to two developers who teach me how to code even though my knowledge was at around 0%. The developers helped me (and still do) even if I never understood anything (and still don\'t :3). So huge thanks, Yanndroid and Tenseventy7!
